infoCollect.title: 1. Information We Collect
infoCollect.intro: We collect information you provide when using our website, such as:

points.1: Name, email, phone number, and address through online forms (for quotations, inquiries, or service requests).
points.2: Data collected automatically via tools like Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, and WhatsApp chat widgets, including website usage and device information.

infoCollect.note: We do not knowingly collect information from minors under 18 years of age.

useInfo.title: 2. How We Use Your Information

points.1: Provide our products and services and respond to your inquiries.
points.2: Improve our website, services, and user experience.
points.3: Send administrative messages, updates, and promotional offers (if you've opted in).
points.4: Analyze website usage through tools like Google Analytics and Facebook Pixel.

useInfo.note: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties, except with service providers who help us operate our website or comply with the law.

points.1: You can opt-out of marketing communications anytime by contacting us at
points.2: You can request access, correction, or deletion of your personal information.
points.3: We take reasonable measures to protect your information, but please be aware that no method of online storage or transmission is completely secure.

updatePolicy.title: 4. Updates to This Policy
updatePolicy.desc: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Updates will be posted on our website, and continued use of the website constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

footer.question: Questions About Our Privacy Policy?
footer.help: We're here to help. Contact us anytime.
